chunks.text:
"Our team is using multiple AI tools, but we are slower than ever."

I'm hearing this every week in my conversations with leaders and top teams.

The problem isn't your team or your strategy—it's that disconnected AI tools can't deliver the intelligence you need. 

At our June 17th virtual event, you'll see how Contextual AI transforms:


*	
	Scattered data into unified intelligence across your entire Workspace.
*	
	Tool chaos into streamlined workflows that actually accelerate work.
*	
	AI expenses into measurable productivity gains and cost savings.
*	
	Information silos into connected insights that drive better decisions.

 
Contextual AI: Why It Matters for the Future of Work
Date: Tuesday, June 17
Time: 12:00 PM PST / 3:00 PM EST
Secure your spot now <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/Ism5CgQl4S4vRV2iZCKh4xN3X?domain=links.clickup.com> 	 
 
Plus: All attendees receive our AI Sprawl Assessment Guide, full recording, and free expert consultation.



Hope to see you there!
Kyle Coleman
GVP of Marketing at ClickUp
